# NWPathStatus | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Network Extension ](/documentation/networkextension)

- [ NWPathStatus ](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus)

-  NWPathStatus 

Enumeration# NWPathStatus

iOS 9.0–18.0DeprecatediPadOS 9.0–18.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–18.0DeprecatedmacOS 10.11–15.0DeprecatedtvOS 17.0–18.0DeprecatedvisionOS 1.0–2.0Deprecated

```
enum NWPathStatus
```

Deprecated

Use the [`nw_path_status_t`](/documentation/Network/nw_path_status_t) type from the [Network](/documentation/Network) framework instead.

## [Topics](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#topics)

### [Path Statuses](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#Path-Statuses)

[`case invalid`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpathstatus/invalid)The path cannot be evaluated.[`case satisfied`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpathstatus/satisfied)The path is ready to be used for network connections.[`case unsatisfied`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpathstatus/unsatisfied)The path for network connections is not available, either due to lack of network connectivity or being prohibited by system policy.[`case satisfiable`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpathstatus/satisfiable)The path is not currently satisfied, but may become satisfied upon a connection attempt. This can be due to a service, such as a VPN or a cellular data connection not being activated.### [Initializers](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpathstatus/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#relationships)

### [Conforms To](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#conforms-to)

- [`BitwiseCopyable`](/documentation/Swift/BitwiseCopyable)

- [`Equatable`](/documentation/Swift/Equatable)

- [`Hashable`](/documentation/Swift/Hashable)

- [`RawRepresentable`](/documentation/Swift/RawRepresentable)

- [`Sendable`](/documentation/Swift/Sendable)

- [`SendableMetatype`](/documentation/Swift/SendableMetatype)

## [See Also](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#see-also)

### [Getting network path properties](/documentation/NetworkExtension/NWPathStatus#Getting-network-path-properties)

[`var status: NWPathStatus`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpath/status)The evaluated status of the network path.Deprecated[`var isExpensive: Bool`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpath/isexpensive)A Boolean that indicates whether or not the path uses an expensive interface.Deprecated[`var isConstrained: Bool`](/documentation/networkextension/nwpath/isconstrained)A Boolean that indicates whether or not the path uses a constrained interface, such as when using low-data mode.Deprecated
